import React from 'react' import s from './Users.module.css' let Users = (props) => { props.setUsersList([ { id: 1, img:"https://media.vanityfair.com/photos/5e2e3af23f3d910008fc55c0/master/pass/remembering-kobe-bryant.jpg", followed: false, name: "Dmitri", status: "I am locking for a job", location: {cityName: "Minsk", country: "Belarus"} }, { id: 2, img:"https://media.vanityfair.com/photos/5e2e3af23f3d910008fc55c0/master/pass/remembering-kobe-bryant.jpg", followed: true, name: "Andrew", status: "I am study React", location: {cityName: "Moscow", country: "Russia"} }, { id: 3, img:"https://media.vanityfair.com/photos/5e2e3af23f3d910008fc55c0/master/pass/remembering-kobe-bryant.jpg", followed: false, name: "Victor", status: "I am student", location: {cityName: "Kiev", country: "Ukraine"} }, ]) return
{props.usersData.map(u =>
{ u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status}
{u.location.cityName}
{u.location.country}
)}
} export default Users
